date: //meta[@name="dcterms.Date"]/@content

body: //div[contains(@class, 'o-titleBar-summary') or contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' c-userContent ') or contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' c-auxContent ') or contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' c-assetStack-media ')]

prune: no
